title: 2024 UCI Gravel World Championships Preview: Routes, Favorites, and How to Watch
content:
'Gravel worlds' kicks off in Flanders on October 5-6 with headliners like Mathieu van der Poel, Pauline Ferrand Prévot, Lotte Kopecky, and Matej Mohorič.

Read the full article at 2024 UCI Gravel World Championships Preview: Routes, Favorites, and How to Watch on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
